column2: - Includes Firearms Recovered and Traced between 1/1/2017 - 12/31/2017, or, if the recovery date was blank, the trace entry date was between 1/1/2017 - 12/31/2017.
- Duplicate traces, Firearms Not Recovered, Gun Buyback and Firearms Turned In are not included in the statistics.
- Statistics are based on a query of the Firearms Tracing System (FTS) on April 11, 2018.
- All traces may not have been submitted or completed at the time of this analysis.
